item.description:
Sat May 17 at 8 pm Ultimate Billiards Pool and LIVE Music Party with the Legendary Jeff Pitchell and Texas Flood

$5 online includes your $5 cover charge and $5 unlimited pool -plus rock and roll from guitar hero Jeff Pitchell! Tickets are only $5 online or $10 at the party.

Don't miss this party!!!

Join Central CT Singles For A Great Night of Pool, Dancing and LIVE Music!

Ultimate Billiards is a giant nightclub with Live Music, over 25 Pool Tables, Ping Pong, Air Hockey, Darts, and a full bar and menu - and great LIVE Music!

They are easy to find -located directly off of the Berlin Turnpike in the Ocean State Plaza across from Berlin Showcase Cinemas.

Ultimate Billiards
151 Webster Square Road
Berlin, CT 06037
(860) 828-7721


Meet Local Singles and have FUN!

Don't play pool? Come on over and listen to the band and keep the guys from getting lonely!

Drink Specials for Central CT Singles Group Members

Live Rock and Blues from Guitar Hero Jeff Pitchell and Texas Flood


Tickets are only $5 at the Party and includes $5 Cover Charge,
or $10 at the party

ONLINE SPECIAL: $5 Tickets Online

Click on the PayPal button to buy your ticket with Credit or Debit Card

FREE LIVE Band
FREE Darts
FREE Air Hockey
FREE Ping Pong
Prizes and Surprises
Have Fun And Meet Local Singles


All age groups are welcome!


More Singles = More Fun

- so print this certificate, bring it to the next Central CT Singles Event and you will:
Receive a half-price ticket with the purchase of 1 ticket or
Receive 1 FREE ticket with the purchase of 2 tickets

Visit http://www.centralcts... and print your More Fun Certificate


See you at the party!
Jason
Central CT Singles
Membership is FREE, Join The Party And Meet Local Singles
(860) 236-3343

Visit http://www.join.Centr... and receive our Upcoming Events Email
item.how_to_find_us: We will be wearing black CTNites.com VIP Entertainment shirts

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Jeff Pitchell and Texas Flood Join the Party - only $5 online!
